name: 陳宏佳
objective:
本課程旨在介紹和探討電子商務的基本概念、原理和實踐。學生將瞭解電子商務的發展背景、關鍵技術、商業模式和相關法律法規等方面的知識。課程內容包括電子商務的基礎概念、網站設計與開發、電子支付系統、網絡營銷、電子商務安全和隱私保護、供應鏈管理以及電子商務的社會和經濟影響等主題。透過案例分析和小組討論，學生將學習如何在電子商務環境中建立和管理成功的網上業務。此外，學生還將進行電商平台的實務操作，瞭解電子商務系統的建置和運營。同時，學生也將探討未來電子商務趨勢和創新。通過本課程的學習，學生將獲得在數字時代運營和成功利用電子商務的能力和知識。


This course aims to introduce and explore the fundamental concepts, principles, and practices of e-commerce. Students will gain an understanding of the development background, key technologies, business models, and relevant laws and regulations in e-commerce. The course covers topics such as the basics of e-commerce, website design and development, electronic payment systems, internet marketing, e-commerce security and privacy protection, supply chain management, and the social and economic impacts of e-commerce. Through case studies and group discussions, students will learn how to establish and manage successful online businesses in the e-commerce environment. Additionally, students will engage in practical exercises on e-commerce platforms to understand the setup and operation of e-commerce systems. Furthermore, students will explore future trends and innovations in e-commerce. By the end of this course, students will acquire the knowledge and skills to operate and leverage e-commerce effectively in the digital era.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹 (Course Introduction)
Week 2: 電子商務基本概念與發展背景 (Fundamental concepts and development background of e-commerce)
Week 3: 電子商務的商業模式 (Business models in e-commerce)
Week 4: 網站設計與開發 (Website design and development)
Week 5: 電子支付系統 (Electronic payment systems)
Week 6: 網絡營銷與推廣 (Internet marketing and promotion)
Week 7: 電子商務安全與隱私保護 (E-commerce security and privacy protection)
Week 8: 供應鏈管理與物流 (Supply chain management and logistics)
Week 9: 期中考周 (midterm exam)
Week 10: 電子商務與社會影響 (E-commerce and its social impacts)
Week 11: 電子商務法律法規 (Legal regulations in e-commerce)
Week 12: 電子商務個案探討 (Case studies in e-commerce)
Week 13: 電商平台實務操作 (Practical operation of e-commerce platforms)
Week 14: 電子商務創新與趨勢 (E-commerce innovations and trends)
Week 15: 跨境電子商務 (Cross-border e-commerce)
Week 16: 電子商務市場分析與策略 (Market analysis and strategies in e-commerce)
Week 17: 電子商務數據分析與決策 (Data analytics and decision-making in e-commerce)
Week 18: 期末考周 (final exam)
